MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA16 postcode area of Greenock, affecting properties in Angus Road and surrounding areas. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the fault on our underground cable network affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.10AM on 21st December 2020.
